text:
Once student groups have created data cards or a table, they can analyze their data by creating tables or graphs to answer research questions.

Show them how to click the buttons on the tile’s toolbar to copy data cards into a table, or a table into data cards. No need to build both! They can also graph data from either format using either the Bar Graph It! or the Graph It! (XY graph) button.

You can also create a graph tile using the buttons on the main toolbar. This will bring up an “empty” graph. Then, you add a dataset you choose. More information is in the User Guide.
